p: Finding shows that different P genotypes of RVA strains interact with distinct blood group histological antigens (HBGA, ABOH, Lewis) and sialic acids via VP4 providing insight into the regional prevalence and increased zoonotic potential of some RVA of origin swine [ 63]. The genotype P[ 6] was identified in piglets in Brazil [ 64] and in Italy and Japan resembling genotype P[ 6] human [ 65, 66].
